mapper.select: SELECT UL.GENRE_ID AS genreId, G.GENRE_NAME AS genreName FROM USER_LIKE UL, GENRE G WHERE UL.GENRE_ID = G.GENRE_ID AND UL.MEMBER_ID = 'USER' ORDER BY UL.GENRE_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_LIKE (LIKE_CNT, MEMBER_ID, GENRE_ID) VALUES (id_seq.nextval, 'USER', #{genreCategory})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_ID = 'USER' AND GENRE_ID = #{genreCategory}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AR.ARTIST_NAME AS artistName, AL.ALBUM_NAME AS albumName, AL.RELEASE_DATE AS releaseDate, S.SONG_NAME AS songName FROM SONG S, ALBUM AL, ARTIST AR, GENRE G WHERE S.ARTIST_ID = AR.ARTIST_ID AND S.ALBUM_ID = AL.ALBUM_ID AND S.GENRE_ID = G.GENRE_ID AND G.GENRE_ID = #{genreId} ORDER BY AL.RELEASE_DATE DESC)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AR.ARTIST_NAME AS artistName, AL.ALBUM_NAME AS albumName, AL.RELEASE_DATE AS releaseDate, S.SONG_NAME AS songName FROM SONG S, ALBUM AL, ARTIST AR, GENRE G WHERE S.ARTIST_ID = AR.ARTIST_ID AND S.ALBUM_ID = AL.ALBUM_ID AND S.GENRE_ID = G.GENRE_ID AND G.GENRE_ID = #{genreId}
AND TO_DATE(AL.RELEASE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE('1980.01.01', 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_DATE('1989.12.31', 'YYYY.MM.DD')
AND TO_DATE(AL.RELEASE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE('1990.01.01', 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_DATE('1999.12.31', 'YYYY.MM.DD')
AND TO_DATE(AL.RELEASE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE('2000.01.01', 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_DATE('2009.12.31', 'YYYY.MM.DD')
AND TO_DATE(AL.RELEASE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE('2010.01.01', 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_DATE('2019.12.31', 'YYYY.MM.DD')
AND TO_DATE(AL.RELEASE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE('2020.01.01', 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_DATE('2029.12.31', 'YYYY.MM.DD')
ORDER BY AL.RELEASE_DATE DESC)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT S.SONG_NAME AS songName, AR.ARTIST_NAME AS artistName, AL.ALBUM_NAME AS albumName, S.SONG_LIKE AS songLike FROM SONG S, ALBUM AL, ARTIST AR, GENRE G WHERE S.ARTIST_ID = AR.ARTIST_ID AND S.ALBUM_ID = AL.ALBUM_ID AND G.GENRE_ID = S.GENRE_ID AND S.GENRE_ID = #{genreId} ORDER BY AL.RELEASE_DATE DESC )
